channel.title: Object deleting help?
channel.description:
is there a shortcut to deleting more then one object in an area?
im making this pkbox, and theres a perfectly square spot btu theres a shitton of boxes and crates in there. like ALOT
So i was wondering instead of measing all my spots and filling out:
[code] removeObject(3111, 9830);//not real coords removeObject(3112, 9828);//not real coords removeObject(3110, 9828);//not real coords[/code]
and doing something similar to this:
[code] if(absX >= 2625 && absX <= 2687 && absY >= 4670 && absY <= 4735)//not real coords[/code]
if so... how?

item.title: Object deleting help?
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

you can do it that way. nd its faster. that looks right. try this
if(absX = 3111,9830 || absX = 3112,9828 || so on and so on){
system.out.println(enter a method in here that deletes an object() = x,x);
}
something like that.

Read full topic
